h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)
content: Instead, return to the temple entrance and look for stairs leading upward. Be wary of more Frozen Corpses coming to life as you ascend, and another will try and ambush you from the left as you reach the next landing.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snowhill_Path_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Snowhill Path Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Frost-Clad Path' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
Instead, return to the temple entrance and look for stairs leading upward. Be wary of more Frozen Corpses coming to life as you ascend, and another will try and ambush you from the left as you reach the next landing.
